# Tablas - Sexo

```{r echo = TRUE}
tab <- data %>%
     tab_prepend_names() %>% 
     tab_cols(total(),DC02) %>% 
	tab_cells(mrset(BRAND1, BRAND2, BRAND3)
	          ) %>%
	tab_stat_cpct() %>%
     tab_cells(Q00430_1 %to% Q00430_12) %>% 
     tab_stat_mean_sd_n() %>% 
     tab_pivot() %>% 
	tab_caption('Objetivo 4')
as.datatable_widget(tab, width=900)
```
